name: Lone Gunman
description:
This Android game was created during my final year at university. Before I get it onto the google play store, i've decided to upload it here and see how the reception is.

In the game you find yourself on an alien planet where all the inhabitants are trying to destroy your ship. You must use your ships guns and the powerups dropped by the aliens to shoot your way off the planet. 

Infinite looping arcade shooter with 4 bosses that spawn on 4 different levels. Boss rush mode available for those who want to test their skill.

All Sprites/Ui drawn by me.

Known Bugs: Sound can be quite buggy and will be fixed in future version

Please let me know if you find any bugs.

Assets Used

Font: https://www.dafont.com/8bit-wonder.font

Background Stars:https://www.deviantart.com/driftwoodbones/art/Animated-Pixel-Stars-Box-Backgroun...

Music: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UChZE0-0R__Z5JtyImRGpDmw/featured

Sounds:http://www.contralogic.com/256-nes-samples/
